techs.name: Agriculture
techs.quote: 'No man ever wetted clay and left it, as if there would be bricks by chance and fortune.' - Plutarch

techs.name: Pottery
techs.quote: 'No man ever wetted clay and left it, as if there would be bricks by chance and fortune.' - Plutarch

techs.name: Animal Husbandry
techs.quote: 'I am fond of pigs. Dogs look up to us. Cats look down on us. Pigs treat us as equals.' - Winston S. Churchill

techs.name: Mining
techs.quote: 'Who deserves more credit than the wife of a coal miner?' - Merle Travis

techs.name: Sailing
techs.quote: 'It is not that life ashore is distasteful to me. But life at sea is better.' - Sir Francis Drake

techs.name: Astrology
techs.quote: 'A physician without a knowledge of astrology has no right to call himself a physician.' - Hippocrates

techs.name: Irrigation
techs.quote: 'The man who has grit enough to bring about the afforestation or the irrigation of a country is not less worthy of honor than its conqueror' - Sir John Thomson

techs.name: Writing
uniques: Enables conversion of city production to [Science]
techs.quote: 'The man who has grit enough to bring about the afforestation or the irrigation of a country is not less worthy of honor than its conqueror' - Paulo Coelho

techs.name: Archery
techs.quote: 'May the forces of evil become confused while your arrow is on its way to the target.' - George Carlin

techs.name: Masonry
techs.quote: 'Each of us is carving a stone, erecting a column, or cutting a piece of stained glass in the construction of something much bigger than ourselves.' - Adrienne Clarkson

techs.name: Bronze Working
techs.quote: 'I'm also interested in creating a lasting legacy ... because bronze will last for thousands of years.' - Richard MacDonald

techs.name: Wheel
techs.quote: 'Don't reinvent the wheel, just realign it.' - Anthony D'Angelo

techs.name: Celestial Navigation
techs.quote: 'Set your course by the stars, not by the lights of every passing ship' - Omar Bradley

techs.name: Currency
uniques: Enables conversion of city production to [Gold]
techs.quote: 'Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.' - Epictetus

techs.name: Horseback Riding
techs.quote: 'A man on a horse is spiritually as well as physically bigger than a man on foot.' - John Steinfield

techs.name: Iron Working
techs.quote: 'The Lord made us all out of iron. Then he turns up the heat to forge some of us into steel.' - Marie Osmond

techs.name: Engineering
techs.quote: 'One man's 'magic' is another man's engineering.' - Robert Heinlein

techs.name: Shipbuilding
techs.quote: 'I cannot imagine any condition which would cause a ship to founder â€¦ Modern shipbuilding has gone beyond that.' - Capt. E.J. Smith, RMS Titanic

techs.name: Mathematics
techs.quote: 'If I were again beginning my studies, I would follow the advice of Plato and start with mathematics.' - Galileo Galilei

techs.name: Construction
techs.quote: 'The four building blocks of the universe are fire, water, gravel and vinyl.' - Dave Barry

techs.name: Buttress
techs.quote: 'Him that overcometh will I make a pillar in the temple of my God, and he shall go no more out.' - Revelation 3:12

techs.name: Military Tactics
techs.quote: 'Strategy requires thought; tactics require observation.' - Max Euwe

techs.name: Apprenticeship
techs.quote: 'We are all apprentices in a craft where no one ever becomes a master.' - Malory

techs.name: Stirrups
techs.quote: 'Betwixt the stirrup and the ground, Mercy I asked, mercy I found.' - William Camden

techs.name: Machinery
techs.quote: 'The press is the best instrument for enlightening the mind of man, and improving him as a rational, moral and social being.' - Thomas Jefferson

techs.name: Education
techs.quote: 'The purpose of education is to replace an empty mind with an open one.' - Malcolm Forbes

techs.name: Military Engineering
techs.quote: 'Blast - Build - Battle' - Motto of the U.S. 16th Engineer Brigade

techs.name: Castles
techs.quote: 'If you see a castle under fog, you must walk there to meet the extraordinary dreams.' - Mehmet Murat Ildan

techs.name: Cartography
uniques: Enables [Embarked] units to enter ocean tiles <starting from the [Ancient era]>
techs.quote: 'If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a cartographer.' - John Quincy Adams

techs.name: Mass Production
techs.quote: 'What can be labeled, packaged, mass produced is neither truth nor art.' - Marty Rubin

techs.name: Astronomy
techs.quote: 'Astronomy's much more fun when you're not an astronomer.' - Brian Miller

techs.name: Banking
techs.quote: 'Compound interest is the most powerful force in the universe.' - Albert Einstein

techs.name: Gunpowder
techs.quote: 'The real use of gunpowder is to make all men tall.' - Thomas Carlyle

techs.name: Siege Tactics
techs.quote: 'The lowest is to attack a city. Siege of a city is only done as a last resort.' - Sun Tzu

techs.name: Printing
techs.quote: 'What gunpowder did for war the printing press has done for the mind.' - Wendell Phillips

techs.name: Square Rigging
techs.quote: 'There is little man has made that approaches anything in nature, but a sailing ship does.' - Allan Villers

techs.name: Metal Casting
techs.quote: 'Don't judge someone until you've stood at his forge and worked with his hammer.' - Rick Riordan

techs.name: Industrialization
techs.quote: 'The key words of violent economics are urbanization, industrialization, centralization, efficiency, quantity, speed.' - E.F Schumacher

techs.name: Scientific Theory
techs.quote: 'If facts don't fit the theory, change the facts.' - Albert Einstein

techs.name: Ballistics
techs.quote: 'It's one thing to surmise what happened, but we don't speculate on that until ballistics confirms what happened ...' - John Hansen

techs.name: Military Science
techs.quote: 'However beautiful the strategy, you should occasionally look at the results.' - Winston Churchill

techs.name: Steam Power
techs.quote: 'It is arguable whether the human race have been gainers by the march of science beyond the steam engine.' - Winston Churchill

techs.name: Sanitation
techs.quote: 'No innovation in the past 200 years has done more to save lives and improve health than the sanitation revolution triggered by the invention of the toilet.' - Sulvia Burwell

techs.name: Economics
techs.quote: 'You and I come by a road or rail, but economists travel on infrastructure' - Margaret Thatcher

techs.name: Rifling
techs.quote: 'Bolt actions speak louder than words.' - Craig Roberts

techs.name: Flight
techs.quote: 'For once you have tasted flight you will walk the earth with your eyes turned skywards, for there you have been and there you will long to return.' - Leonardo da Vinci

techs.name: Replaceable Parts
techs.quote: 'For a machine to run smoothly and predictably, its parts must be standard and hence replaceable.' - Charles Eisenstein

techs.name: Steel
techs.quote: 'The best steel doesn't always shine the brightest.' - Joe Abercrombie

techs.name: Refining
techs.quote: 'Engineering is the art of directing the great sources of power in nature for the use and convenience of man.' - Thomas Tredgold

techs.name: Electricity
techs.quote: 'Benjamin Franklin may have discovered electricity, but it was the man who invented the meter who made the money.' - Earl Wilson

techs.name: Radio
techs.quote: 'Radio is the theater of the mind; television is the theater of the mindless.' - Steve Allen

techs.name: Chemistry
techs.quote: 'Chemists do not usually stutter. It would be very awkward if they did, seeing that they have at times to get out such words as methylethylamylophenylium.' - Sir William Crookes

techs.name: Combustion
techs.quote: 'The cars haven't advanced that much since we were kids. When you boil it down, it's still a gas combustion engine.' - Dana Brunetti

techs.name: Advanced Flight
techs.quote: 'If God had really intended men to fly, He'd make it easier to get to the airport.' - George Winters

techs.name: Rocketry
techs.quote: 'Rocket science has been mythologized all out of proportion to its true difficulty.' - Joseph Carmack

techs.name: Advanced Ballistics
techs.quote: 'Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.' - W. Clement Stone

techs.name: Combined Arms
techs.quote: 'Better to fight for something than live for nothing.' - George S. Patton

techs.name: Plastics
techs.quote: 'Nothing on this earth lasts forever. Except maybe plastic.' - Patricia Dunn

techs.name: Computers
techs.quote: 'The good thing about computers is that they do what you tell them to do. The bad news is that they do what you tell them to do.' - Ted Nelson

techs.name: Nuclear Fission
techs.quote: 'Leave the atom alone.' - E.Y Harburg

techs.name: Synthetic Materials
techs.quote: 'There's so much plastic in this culture that vinyl leopard skin is becoming an endangered synthetic.' - Lily Tomlin

techs.name: Telecommunications
techs.quote: 'Mr. Watson... Come here... I want to see you.' - Alexander Graham Bell

techs.name: Satellites
techs.quote: 'A satellite has no conscience.' - Edward R. Murrow

techs.name: Guidance Systems
techs.quote: 'If you do not change direction, you may end up where you were heading.' - Lao Tzu

techs.name: Lasers
techs.quote: 'When God said 'Let there be light,' he surely must have meant perfectly coherent light.' - Charles Townes

techs.name: Composites
techs.quote: 'It is obvious that while science is struggling to bring Heaven to Earth some men are using its materials in the construction of Hell.' - Herbert Hoover

techs.name: Stealth Technology
techs.quote: 'I would say invisibility would be sort of a fun power to have just to see what it was like to move through the world and not be looked at.' - Kevin Bacon

techs.name: Robotics
techs.quote: 'Robotics has been around forever, and it's been the next big thing forever, and it is so exciting and compelling that it's easy to get carried away.' - Colin Angle

techs.name: Nuclear Fusion
techs.quote: 'I am a big proponent of harness the power of fusion - from 93 million miles away. Fusion is done by our sun really, really well and for free. Here on Earth in reactors, not so much..' - Joe Romm

techs.name: Nanotechnology
techs.quote: 'If technology is the engine of change, then nanotechnology is the fuel for humanity's future.' - Natasha Vita-More

techs.name: Seasteads
techs.quote: 'I must go down to the seas again, to the vagrant gypsy life, to the gull's way and the whale's way where the wind is like a whetted knife.' - John Masefield

techs.name: Advanced AI
uniques: [GDR] units gain the [Drone Air Defense] promotion
techs.quote: 'Will no entreaties cause thee to turn a favourable eye upon thy creature, woh implores thy goodness and compassion?' - Mary Shelley

techs.name: Advanced Power Cells
uniques: [GDR] units gain the [Particle Beam Siege Cannon] promotion
techs.quote: 'The incomplete becomes complete; the crooked becomes straight; the empty becomes full; the worn out becomes new.' - Tao Te Ching, Lao Tzu

techs.name: Cybernetics
techs.quote: 'If there is any work in the afterlife, you must do it. Behold me whenever you are called. Be watchful at any moment to work there. Plough my fields, carry water and sand to the east and west. Behold me whenever you are called.' - Incsciription on an Egyptian Ushabti

techs.name: Smart Materials
uniques: [GDR] units gain the [Reinforced Armor Plating] promotion
techs.quote: 'It ascends from the earth to the heaven, and it again descends to the earth and receives the force of things superior and inferior.' - Hermes Trismegistus

techs.name: Predictive Systems
techs.quote: 'If the enemy know not where he will be attacked, he mmust prepare in every quarter, and so be everywhere weak.' - Sun Tzu

techs.name: Offworld Mission
techs.quote: 'No, my friends, we have not fallen abck upon the erath; no, nor are we submerged in the Gulf of Mexico. Yes! We are mounting into space. See those stars shsining in the night, and that impenetrable darkness heaped up between the earth and us!' - Julius Verne

techs.name: Future Tech
uniques: Who knows what the future holds?
techs.quote: 'There is nothing like a dream to create the future' - Victor Hugo
